description:
XMen 97 just tried to kill Wolverine… at least… that’s what it looks like! In the epic Sentinel fight scene, Gambit charges up Wolverine’s claws by turning potential energy into kinetic energy, so shouldn’t Wolverine have exploded? Well, there’s actually a simple answer that has to do with Wolverine’s skeleton and the usage of a “Power Circuit”!
‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐
*Credits:*
Writers: Forrest Lee and Bob Chipman
Editor: Dom Sealion
Sound Designer: Yosi Berman 
‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐

title: XMen 97 Tried to KILL Wolverine ☠️! #shorts
